dbi.BaseDatabase

class BaseDatabase: dbi.Database.Database;
Base Database implementation that it is suggested that other DBD's inherit from. This defines a few functions that are DBD independent such as Database.queryFetchOne and Database.queryFetchAll. For all other functions a DBIException is thrown with the message content "Not impemented."

New DBD classes should inherit from BaseDatabase, not directly from the Database interface.

See Also:
